info.name: Reckon- AgroVision Weather API
info.description:
# AgroVision
### Complete API guide on the project


AgroVision makes use of various public free and paid APIs(free tier demo).

- Weather API by weatherapi.com
- SMS API by Twilio.com
- Pincode to Coordinates by india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude on rapidapi.com/vigowebs/api/india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude


###### The Flow of Data through APIs for the complete service completion is:

Step 1:- User Enters Details on Login Page(mobile_no and pincode).
Step 2:- Fetching User's Address and Coordinates with Pincode using our "Pincode to Coordinates" API.
Step 3:- Using User coordinates, Call "Weather API" for Weather Data and Alerts for the Region.
Step 4:- Finally Process the Data Received into understandable Format.
Step 5:- Finally Send the Data over SMS service to the user using the "SMS API".

#### Details of each API is given Below:


##### --> Weather API
Default Method : GET

Get Weather Data:
```sh
http://api.weatherapi.com/v1/current.json?key=<Your_API_KEY>&q=Jodhpur, Rajasthan&aqi=no
```

Get Weather Forecast for N days:
```sh
http://api.weatherapi.com/v1/forecast.json?key=<Your_API_KEY>&q=Jodhpur, Rajasthan&days=1&aqi=no&alerts=no
```

Get Weather Forecast for N days and Weather ALerts:
```sh
http://api.weatherapi.com/v1/forecast.json?key=<Your_API_KEY>&q=Jodhpur, Rajasthan&days=1&aqi=no&alerts=yes
```

The complete documentation can be found [here](https://www.weatherapi.com/docs/)

 
##### --> Fetching Coordinates from Pincode
Get Coordinates from Pincode:
```sh
https://india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/pincode/<pincode>
```
The complete documentation can be found [here](https://rapidapi.com/vigowebs/api/india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude)


##### --> SMS API 
For Sending Data over SMS service, we integrated Twilio API in our codebase through its npm Module-
```sh
$ npm install twilio
```

The complete documentation of its SMS service can be found [here](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms)
